str2: A particle of succession, then, moreover.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
An instructor, trainer; almost: a chastiser. From paideuo; a trainer, i.e. Teacher or discipliner.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: From en and the base of trope; to invert, i.e. in a good sense, to respect; or in a bad one, to confound.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: From hupo and tasso; to subordinate; reflexively, to obey.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
